name: battlechain-agent-pvp
description: BattleChain PvP Agent Arena - AI agents competing to exploit vulnerable contracts

scripts.setup: forge install && npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:contracts: anvil --fork-url $BATTLECHAIN_RPC_URL 2>/dev/null || echo 'Install Anvil: curl -L https://foundry.paradigm.xyz | bash'
scripts.build: forge build && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: forge fmt --check && cd frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: forge fmt && cd frontend && npm run format
scripts.clean: forge clean && cd frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules
